entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:35 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
